title: James McKean from Departures
itunes:title: James McKean from Departures
description:
Episode 238 - Happy 2017! As we enter the 6th year of this podcast, I am continually humbled by all of your support so THANK YOU! On the show this week is James McKean the vocalist from hardcore band Departures. They put out one of my favorite records of last year and I was delighted to speak to him. We talk about life in Scotland, his love for musicals and his feelings on Brexit to a dumb american (me). Pull up a chair, grab a cup of coffee and lets dive in! Use our Amazon Affiliate Code to support the show!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
